title: Alphabet : number of full-time employees 2016 , by department
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 4 lines namely Research and development, Sales and marketing, General and administrative, and Operations. The y axis represents Number of employees and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Research and development is rapidly increasing, Sales and marketing, General and administrative, and Operations are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Research and development has increased by 3.7 times.

The lines ordered according to average values of Number of employees in descending order is: 1. Research and development, 2. Sales and marketing, 3. Operations, and lastly, 4. General and administrative.

Throughout the period, Research and development generally had the highest Number of employees relative to others with an average of 16171.78, and it reached its maximum at 2016 with a value of 27169.0.
Followed by Sales and marketing which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 13812.2 Number of employees,reaching its highest point  at 2016 with a value of 20902.0.
The botommost line, General and administrative,  has a mean of 5831.22, and peaked at 2016.
